original_title: Episódio Extra… SQN Nos Bastidores de Tudo Igual
overview: What's it like to shoot a series that takes place in Rio de Janeiro during the summer and São Paulo during the winter? What were some of the challenges related to producing a series during a pandemic? Author and screenwriter Luly Trigo takes us behind the scenes in this "live" special.
title: Extra Episode, or Not: Behind the Scenes of All the Same
